txt.en: 'No, I don't, but I have my suspicions. You see Adaric Burrows over there? I think he hauled this thing into my field overnight in order to eliminate my pipe-weed from contention! He's had it in for me ever since he saw how well my plants were doing! Well, now they're all gone, thanks to that sneak!\n\n'Couldn't have carried it, you say? Well, he probably dragged it with a team of horses. No, I don't see any ruts in the earth, but I just know he's the one that's done it!'
You don't know where it came from?
